5#ifndef V8_SNAPSHOT_READ_ONLY_SERIALIZER_DESERIALIZER_H_
6#define V8_SNAPSHOT_READ_ONLY_SERIALIZER_DESERIALIZER_H_
7
8#include "src/common/globals.h"
9
10namespace v8 {
11namespace internal {
12namespace ro {
13
14// Common functionality for RO serialization and deserialization.
15
16enum Bytecode {
17 // kAllocatePage parameters:
18 // Uint30 page_index
19 // Uint30 area_size_in_bytes
20 // IF_STATIC_ROOTS(Uint32 compressed_page_address)
21 kAllocatePage,
22 //
23 // kSegment parameters:
24 // Uint30 page_index
25 // Uint30 offset
26 // Uint30 size_in_bytes
27 // ... segment byte stream
28 kSegment,
29 //
30 // kRelocateSegment parameters:
31 // ... relocation byte stream
32 kRelocateSegment,
33 //
34 // kReadOnlyRootsTable parameters:
35 // IF_STATIC_ROOTS(... ro roots table slots)
36 kReadOnlyRootsTable,
37 //
38 kFinalizeReadOnlySpace,
39};
40static constexpr int kNumberOfBytecodes =
41 static_cast<int>(kFinalizeReadOnlySpace) + 1;
42
43// Like std::vector<bool> but with a known underlying encoding.
44class BitSet final {
45 public:
46 explicit BitSet(size_t size_in_bits)
47 : size_in_bits_(size_in_bits),
48 data_(new uint8_t[size_in_bytes()]()),
49 owns_data_(true) {}
50
51 explicit BitSet(uint8_t* data, size_t size_in_bits)
52 : size_in_bits_(size_in_bits), data_(data), owns_data_(false) {}
53
54 ~BitSet() {
55 if (owns_data_) delete[] data_;
56 }
57
58 bool contains(int i) const {
59 DCHECK(0 <= i && i < static_cast<int>(size_in_bits_));
60 return (data_[chunk_index(i)] & bit_mask(i)) != 0;
61 }
62
63 void set(int i) {
64 DCHECK(0 <= i && i < static_cast<int>(size_in_bits_));
65 data_[chunk_index(i)] |= bit_mask(i);
66 }
67
68 size_t size_in_bits() const { return size_in_bits_; }
69 size_t size_in_bytes() const {
70 return RoundUp<kBitsPerByte>(size_in_bits_) / kBitsPerByte;
71 }
72
73 const uint8_t* data() const { return data_; }
74
75 private:
76 static constexpr int kBitsPerChunk = kUInt8Size * kBitsPerByte;
77 static constexpr int chunk_index(int i) { return i / kBitsPerChunk; }
78 static constexpr int bit_index(int i) { return i % kBitsPerChunk; }
79 static constexpr uint32_t bit_mask(int i) { return 1 << bit_index(i); }
80
81 const size_t size_in_bits_;
82 uint8_t* const data_;
83 const bool owns_data_;
84};
85
86// Tagged slots need relocation after deserialization when V8_STATIC_ROOTS is
87// disabled.
88//
89// Note this encoding works for all remaining build configs, in particular for
90// all supported kTaggedSize values.
91struct EncodedTagged {
92 static constexpr int kPageIndexBits = 5; // Max 32 RO pages.
93 static constexpr int kOffsetBits = 27;
94 static constexpr int kSize = kUInt32Size;
95
96 uint32_t ToUint32() const {
97 static_assert(kSize == kUInt32Size);
98 return *reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(this);
99 }
100 static EncodedTagged FromUint32(uint32_t v) {
101 return FromAddress(reinterpret_cast<Address>(&v));
102 }
103 static EncodedTagged FromAddress(Address address) {
104 return *reinterpret_cast<EncodedTagged*>(address);
105 }
106
107 int page_index : kPageIndexBits;
108 int offset : kOffsetBits; // Shifted by kTaggedSizeLog2.
109};
110static_assert(EncodedTagged::kSize == sizeof(EncodedTagged));
111
112struct EncodedExternalReference {
113 static constexpr int kIsApiReferenceBits = 1;
114 static constexpr int kIndexBits = 31;
115 static constexpr int kSize = kUInt32Size;
116
117 uint32_t ToUint32() const {
118 static_assert(kSize == kUInt32Size);
119 return *reinterpret_cast<const uint32_t*>(this);
120 }
121 static EncodedExternalReference FromUint32(uint32_t v) {
122 return *reinterpret_cast<EncodedExternalReference*>(&v);
123 }
124
125 // This ctor is needed to convert parameter types. We can't use bool/uint32_t
126 // as underlying member types since that messes with field packing on
127 // windows.
128 EncodedExternalReference(bool is_api_reference, uint32_t index)
129 : is_api_reference(is_api_reference), index(index) {}
130
131 int is_api_reference : kIsApiReferenceBits;
132 int index : kIndexBits;
133};
134static_assert(EncodedExternalReference::kSize ==
135 sizeof(EncodedExternalReference));
136
137} // namespace ro
138} // namespace internal
139} // namespace v8
140
